sentences.en: All of our best laid plans are down the drain.
sentences.cn: 我们所有精心布置的计划都付之东流

sentences.en: Can you drain the spaghetti, please (= pour away the water from the pan ) ?
sentences.cn: 你把意大利面滤干好吗？

sentences.en: Drain and rinse the pasta.
sentences.cn: 把通心粉过一过水。

sentences.en: Drain off any remaining water.
sentences.cn: 把剩下的水排干。

sentences.en: Drain off the rest of the wine from this barrel.
sentences.cn: 把桶里剩余的酒排出去.

sentences.en: Drain the beans thoroughly and save the stock for soup.
sentences.cn: 将豆角彻底控干，并把滤出的豆汁留下做汤。

sentences.en: Drain the pasta as soon as it is cooked.
sentences.cn: 意大利面煮熟以后立即将水沥干。

sentences.en: First, you have to drain the container of all the old oil.
sentences.cn: 首先, 你得从油箱中把所有的陈油都抽去.

sentences.en: He flushed the drain.
sentences.cn: 他用水冲排水沟。

sentences.en: He will drain, rather than enrich, the country.
sentences.cn: 他会耗尽而不是增加该国的财富。

sentences.en: Ho hum, another nice job down the drain.
sentences.cn: ，又一份好工作泡汤了。

sentences.en: Huge imports were draining the country’s currency reserves.
sentences.cn: 大量的进口正在耗尽该国的货币储备。

sentences.en: I can help resolve conflicts that drain energy.
sentences.cn: 我可以帮助解决消耗精力的冲突。

sentences.en: I drain the pasta, then I share it out between two plates.
sentences.cn: 我将意大利面滤干，然后平分到两个盘子里。

sentences.en: I watched the bath water drain away.
sentences.cn: 我看着浴缸里的水流光。

sentences.en: Military spending is a huge drain on the country's resources.
sentences.cn: 军费开支是对国家资源的巨大耗费。

sentences.en: Miners built the tunnel to drain water out of the mines.
sentences.cn: 矿工们开掘了隧道以将水排出矿井。

sentences.en: Small local stores are going down the drain.
sentences.cn: 当地的小店都倒闭了。

sentences.en: Springs and rivers that drain into lakes carry dissolved nitrates and phosphates.
sentences.cn: 流入湖中的泉水和河水携带了溶于水的硝酸盐和磷酸盐。

sentences.en: The authorities have mobilized vast numbers of people to drain flooded land and build or repair dikes.
sentences.cn: 当局动员了大批民众为遭受洪灾的地区排涝并修建或修复堤坝。

sentences.en: The boat drifted helplessly along the drain until some people saw him.
sentences.cn: 船儿无助地顺着排水沟漂流直到有人看见他。

sentences.en: The flood was caused by a blocked drain .
sentences.cn: 溢水是由排水管堵塞引起的。

sentences.en: the government must stop public money going down the drain.
sentences.cn: 政府必须停止浪费国家资金。

sentences.en: The results of years of work went down the drain.
sentences.cn: 多年工作的成果全都白费了.

sentences.en: The ridged design of the pan allows excess fat to drain off.
sentences.cn: 平底锅的凸纹设计使多余的油能够控出。

sentences.en: The swimming pool is drained and cleaned every winter.
sentences.cn: 每年冬天这座游泳池都要排干清洗。

sentences.en: The water swirled down the drain.
sentences.cn: 水打着旋流进了下水道。

sentences.en: There’s a problem with the drains .
sentences.cn: 下水道有问题。

words.tran_cn: 排水；排水系统；污水；排水面积
排水；下水道，[建]排水管；消耗

phrases.tran_cn: 处于被浪费或丢失状态
v. 渐渐枯竭；排去；流尽
渐渐枯竭；把…排出去；排除
地漏；地面排水管；楼面排水
放油孔；泄油；滑油放油嘴

trans.tran_en: something that continuously uses a lot of time, money etc

trans.tran_cn: 排出，（使）流干，喝光，使…耗尽
trans.tran_en: to make the water or liquid in something flow away
to make the water or liquid in something flow away
to use too much of something, especially money, so that there is not enough left
